document.full_text: an out-of-control wildfire has charred 2,000 acres, destroyed at least one house and forced the evacuations of 336 homes in a mountain canyon west of fort collins, colorado, fire officials said on sunday.
document.title: colorado wildfire forces evacuation of hundreds of homes
lines_and_colors: an out-of-control wildfire has charred 2,000 acres, destroyed at least one house and forced the evacuations of 336 homes in a mountain canyon west of fort collins, colorado, fire officials said on sunday.
